ShadowSiren:AbyssalSurge.NAME: Abyssal Surge
ShadowSiren:AbyssalSurge.DESCRIPTION: Enter shadowsiren:Abyss. NL Gain [E] . NL Exhaust.

ShadowSiren:Advance.NAME: Advance
ShadowSiren:Advance.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Increase the Block of *Retreat by !M!.

ShadowSiren:AdvanceDual.NAME: Retreat
ShadowSiren:AdvanceDual.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Increase the damage of *Advance by !M!.

ShadowSiren:Anchor.NAME: Anchor
ShadowSiren:Anchor.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Automatically exhausts out of shadowsiren:Abyss. NL Exhaust.
ShadowSiren:Anchor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Automatically exhausts out of shadowsiren:Abyss. NL Exhaust.

ShadowSiren:Ash.NAME: Ash
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: TRANSLATOR NOTE: Card name with be '' (Monster Name) ' Ashes', such as 'Louse Ashes'. Use the leading '' if you need it formatted like 'Ash of Louse' in your language.
TRANSLATOR NOTE: Card description will be 'A memento of' (Monster Name) '.', such as 'A memento of Louse.'. Use the trailing '.' if you need it formatted like 'Louse's memento.' in your language.

ShadowSiren:AshCloud.NAME: Ash Cloud
ShadowSiren:AshCloud.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! shadowsiren:Burn to ALL enemies.

ShadowSiren:AshCloudDual.NAME: Pyroclast
ShadowSiren:AshCloudDual.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !D! HP, calculates as damage, and have !M! shadowsiren:Burn applied.

ShadowSiren:BigGloves.NAME: Big Gloves
ShadowSiren:BigGloves.DESCRIPTION: All Fist Attacks deal !M! more damage.

ShadowSiren:BlackRose.NAME: Black Roses
ShadowSiren:BlackRose.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! shadowsiren:Hex to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

ShadowSiren:BlastBurn.NAME: Blast Burn
ShadowSiren:BlastBurn.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Apply shadowsiren:Burn to ALL enemies equal to unblocked damage dealt.

ShadowSiren:BlindingCounter.NAME: Blinding Counter
ShadowSiren:BlindingCounter.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you are attacked, apply Weak to the attacker.
ShadowSiren:BlindingCounter.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you are attacked, apply Weak to the attacker.

ShadowSiren:BoundlessSea.NAME: Boundless Sea
ShadowSiren:BoundlessSea.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust any Curse or Status cards drawn this way.

ShadowSiren:BoundlessSeaDual.NAME: Endless Depths
ShadowSiren:BoundlessSeaDual.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust any Curse or Status cards drawn this way. NL Exhaust.

ShadowSiren:Cloak.NAME: Cloak
ShadowSiren:Cloak.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Twice as effective if you have a debuff.

ShadowSiren:CloakDual.NAME: Dagger
ShadowSiren:CloakDual.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Twice as effective if the target has a debuff.

ShadowSiren:Collapse.NAME: Collapse
ShadowSiren:Collapse.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! HP (plus !ShadowSiren:SecondMagic! for each Power in play) X times. NL (Causes !ShadowSiren:ThirdMagic! HP Loss)

ShadowSiren:Crush.NAME: Crush
ShadowSiren:Crush.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Add !M! shadowsiren:Splash to your Exhaust pile when this card deals unblocked damage.

ShadowSiren:CrushDual.NAME: Quash
ShadowSiren:CrushDual.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage (plus !M! for each card in your Exhaust pile) to ALL enemies. NL (Plus !ShadowSiren:SecondMagic! damage)

ShadowSiren:CursedFlames.NAME: Cursed Flames
ShadowSiren:CursedFlames.DESCRIPTION: At the beginning of your turn, all shadowsiren:Burns are increased by !M!.

ShadowSiren:DiamondInTheRough.NAME: Prismatic Diamond
ShadowSiren:DiamondInTheRough.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1: NL Enter shadowsiren:Veil. NL Enter shadowsiren:Abyss. NL Enter shadowsiren:Huge. NL Enter shadowsiren:Hyper.

ShadowSiren:Discharge.NAME: Discharge
ShadowSiren:Discharge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL shadowsiren:Charge is twice as effective for this card.

ShadowSiren:EnergyConversion.NAME: Energy Conversion
ShadowSiren:EnergyConversion.DESCRIPTION: When gaining shadowsiren:Charge, also gain !M! Vigor.

ShadowSiren:EnergyConversionDual.NAME: Energy Reversion
ShadowSiren:EnergyConversionDual.DESCRIPTION: When gaining shadowsiren:Charge, also gain !M! shadowsiren:Electric.

ShadowSiren:EvilPlan.NAME: Evil Plan
ShadowSiren:EvilPlan.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and !M! Vigor. NL Next turn, enter shadowsiren:Veil.

ShadowSiren:Flamethrower.NAME: Flamethrower
ShadowSiren:Flamethrower.DESCRIPTION: Upon playing a card, apply !M! shadowsiren:Burn to an enemy.

ShadowSiren:FlamethrowerDual.NAME: Waterthrower
ShadowSiren:FlamethrowerDual.DESCRIPTION: Upon playing a card, apply !M! shadowsiren:Drench to an enemy.

ShadowSiren:FlameCurse.NAME: Flame Curse
ShadowSiren:FlameCurse.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! shadowsiren:Burn and !ShadowSiren:SecondMagic! shadowsiren:Hex. NL Exhaust.
ShadowSiren:FlameCurse.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! shadowsiren:Burn and !ShadowSiren:SecondMagic! shadowsiren:Hex to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

ShadowSiren:Grab.NAME: Grab
ShadowSiren:Grab.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you are in a Stance, exit it and add !M! *Pummel to your hand.

ShadowSiren:Hexagone.NAME: Hexagone
ShadowSiren:Hexagone.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the target has shadowsiren:Hex, remove it and apply twice that much shadowsiren:Burn.
ShadowSiren:Hexagone.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the target has shadowsiren:Hex, remove it and apply thrice that much shadowsiren:Burn.

ShadowSiren:HexBlast.NAME: Hex Blast
ShadowSiren:HexBlast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! shadowsiren:Hex plus !ShadowSiren:SecondMagic! for each unique debuff on the target.

ShadowSiren:HexingStrike.NAME: Hexing Strike
ShadowSiren:HexingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply shadowsiren:Hex equal to unblocked damage dealt.

ShadowSiren:HugePower.NAME: Huge Power
ShadowSiren:HugePower.DESCRIPTION: Enter shadowsiren:Huge. NL The next attack you play costs 0.

ShadowSiren:HugePowerDual.NAME: Cosmic Power
ShadowSiren:HugePowerDual.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! shadowsiren:Charge. NL The next attack you play costs 0.

ShadowSiren:HyperMode.NAME: Hyper Mode
ShadowSiren:HyperMode.DESCRIPTION: Enter shadowsiren:Hyper. NL Costs 1 less [E] for each shadowsiren:Charge generated this combat.

ShadowSiren:ImprisonDual.NAME: Entomb
ShadowSiren:ImprisonDual.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable, Weak, shadowsiren:Soft, and shadowsiren:Drench.

ShadowSiren:Improvise.NAME: Improvise
ShadowSiren:Improvise.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand, then deal !D! damage for every card discarded this way.

ShadowSiren:Manjushage.NAME: Manjushage
ShadowSiren:Manjushage.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] [E] . NL Gain !M! Double Damage. NL Gain !M! shadowsiren:Fading.

ShadowSiren:MegaFistDual.NAME: Heroic Fist
ShadowSiren:MegaFistDual.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Damage modifiers are 50% more effective for this card.

ShadowSiren:MoltenBody.NAME: Molten Body
ShadowSiren:MoltenBody.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an Attack deals unblocked damage, apply !M! shadowsiren:Burn.

ShadowSiren:Multiply.NAME: Multiply
ShadowSiren:Multiply.DESCRIPTION: Multiply the debuffs of ALL enemies by !M!. NL Exhaust.

ShadowSiren:NightTerror.NAME: Night Terror
ShadowSiren:NightTerror.DESCRIPTION: Deal 25% more damage while in shadowsiren:Veil. NL Add a copy of this card to the top of your draw pile.

ShadowSiren:OverchargeForm.NAME: Overcharge Form
ShadowSiren:OverchargeForm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL At the beginning of your turn, gain !M! shadowsiren:Charge and increase this gain by !M!.
ShadowSiren:OverchargeForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the beginning of your turn, gain !M! shadowsiren:Charge and increase this gain by !M!.

ShadowSiren:ParadigmShift.NAME: Paradigm Shift
ShadowSiren:ParadigmShift.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Costs 1 less [E] for each time you change Stances this combat.

ShadowSiren:PhasingStrike.NAME: Phasing Strike
ShadowSiren:PhasingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you changed Stances this turn, gain !M! [E].

ShadowSiren:PiezoCapacitor.NAME: Piezo Capacitor
ShadowSiren:PiezoCapacitor.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you receive unblocked attack damage, gain 1 shadowsiren:Charge.
ShadowSiren:PiezoCapacitor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you receive unblocked attack damage, gain 1 shadowsiren:Charge.

ShadowSiren:PocketDimension.NAME: Pocket Dimension
ShadowSiren:PocketDimension.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you change Stances, draw !M! card.

ShadowSiren:PowerSurge.NAME: Power Surge
ShadowSiren:PowerSurge.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! shadowsiren:Charge and !ShadowSiren:SecondMagic! Vigor. NL Exhaust.

ShadowSiren:PreemptiveStrike.NAME: Preemptive Strike
ShadowSiren:PreemptiveStrike.DESCRIPTION: Innate. Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Damage doubles if this is the first card played this turn.

ShadowSiren:Preparation.NAME: Preparation
ShadowSiren:Preparation.DESCRIPTION: Retain your hand this turn. Next turn, NL gain [E] [E] .
ShadowSiren:Preparation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain your hand this turn. Next turn, NL gain [E] [E] [E] .

ShadowSiren:PreparationDual.NAME: Discipline
ShadowSiren:PreparationDual.DESCRIPTION: When Retained, increase the damage of all cards in your hand by !M! this combat.

ShadowSiren:Pummel.NAME: Pummel
ShadowSiren:Pummel.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Add one *Throw to your hand. NL Exhaust.

ShadowSiren:QuickFist.NAME: Quick Fist
ShadowSiren:QuickFist.DESCRIPTION: Deal X damage !M! times. NL (Deals !ShadowSiren:SecondMagic! damage)

ShadowSiren:Recuperate.NAME: Recuperate
ShadowSiren:Recuperate.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Remove !M! debuff if you have any, otherwise draw !M! card.

ShadowSiren:ReinforcedPlating.NAME: Reinforced Plating
ShadowSiren:ReinforcedPlating.DESCRIPTION: Each turn, prevent the first time you would lose Block.

ShadowSiren:ResidualStatic.NAME: Residual Static
ShadowSiren:ResidualStatic.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each shadowsiren:Charge generated this combat. NL Gain !M! shadowsiren:Charge. NL (Hits !ShadowSiren:SecondMagic! times)

ShadowSiren:ShadowCallDual.NAME: Shadow Return
ShadowSiren:ShadowCallDual.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Exit shadowsiren:Veil. NL Gain !B! Block.

ShadowSiren:SinisterReflection.NAME: Sinister Reflection
ShadowSiren:SinisterReflection.DESCRIPTION: When a debuff is applied to you, it is also applied to ALL enemies.

ShadowSiren:SmokeBomb.NAME: Smoke Bomb
ShadowSiren:SmokeBomb.DESCRIPTION: Enter shadowsiren:Smoke. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust.

ShadowSiren:SmokeBombDual.NAME: Smokescreen
ShadowSiren:SmokeBombDual.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

ShadowSiren:Squall.NAME: Squall
ShadowSiren:Squall.DESCRIPTION: Excess cards discarded by shadowsiren:Smoke deal !M! damage to the attacker.

ShadowSiren:SpookDual.NAME: Terrorize
ShadowSiren:SpookDual.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

ShadowSiren:Swagger.NAME: Swagger
ShadowSiren:Swagger.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! shadowsiren:Confused. NL Target deals double damage this turn.

ShadowSiren:Swerve.NAME: Swerve
ShadowSiren:Swerve.DESCRIPTION: Enter shadowsiren:Abyss. NL Gain !B! Block plus half the target's intent. NL Apply !M! shadowsiren:Dizzy. NL (Gains !ShadowSiren:SecondMagic! Block)

ShadowSiren:SwerveDual.NAME: Reversal
ShadowSiren:SwerveDual.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage plus half the target's intent. NL Apply !M! shadowsiren:Confused. NL (Deals !ShadowSiren:SecondMagic! damage)

ShadowSiren:Throw.NAME: Throw
ShadowSiren:Throw.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Choose 1 Throw. NL Exhaust.
ShadowSiren:Throw.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Choose 1 Throw. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

ShadowSiren:TidalCall.NAME: Tidal Call
ShadowSiren:TidalCall.DESCRIPTION: Enter shadowsiren:Abyss. NL Deal !D! damage and apply !M! shadowsiren:Drench to ALL enemies.

ShadowSiren:TidalCallDual.NAME: Tidal Curse
ShadowSiren:TidalCallDual.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! shadowsiren:Drench and shadowsiren:Hex to ALL enemies.

ShadowSiren:TrickDual.NAME: Treat
ShadowSiren:TrickDual.DESCRIPTION: Gain !D! Block twice, calculates as damage.

ShadowSiren:VacuumFist.NAME: Vacuum Fist
ShadowSiren:VacuumFist.DESCRIPTION: Enter shadowsiren:Abyss. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable.

ShadowSiren:VacuumFistDual.NAME: Abyssal Fist
ShadowSiren:VacuumFistDual.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! shadowsiren:Drench.

ShadowSiren:VigorousShift.NAME: Vigorous Shift
ShadowSiren:VigorousShift.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you change stances, gain !M! Vigor.

ShadowSiren:Whiteout.NAME: Whiteout
ShadowSiren:Whiteout.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! shadowsiren:Freeze to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

ShadowSiren:WillOWisp.NAME: Will-o'-Wisp
ShadowSiren:WillOWisp.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! shadowsiren:Burn. NL When the enemy dies, apply its shadowsiren:Burn to ALL enemies.

ShadowSiren:AttackTextContainer.NAME: Generic Attack Text
ShadowSiren:AttackTextContainer.DESCRIPTION: Extended Description used to hold text that will occasionally appear when playing an attack.

ShadowSiren:SkillTextContainer.NAME: Generic Skill Text
ShadowSiren:SkillTextContainer.DESCRIPTION: Extended Description used to hold text that will occasionally appear when playing a skill.

ShadowSiren:PowerTextContainer.NAME: Generic Power Text
ShadowSiren:PowerTextContainer.DESCRIPTION: Extended Description used to hold text that will occasionally appear when playing a power.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I think I'll give it a shot.

ShadowSiren:BattleStartTextContainer.NAME: Battle Start Text
ShadowSiren:BattleStartTextContainer.DESCRIPTION: Extended Description used to hold text that will occasionally appear at the beginning of combat.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Sure, I have time for you.
You want me to burn you?

ShadowSiren:LowHPBattleStartTextContaine.NAME: Low HP Battle Start Text
ShadowSiren:LowHPBattleStartTextContaine.DESCRIPTION: Extended Description used to hold text that will occasionally appear at the beginning of combat if you are badly injured.

ShadowSiren:BattleEndTextContainer.NAME: Battle End Text
ShadowSiren:BattleEndTextContainer.DESCRIPTION: Extended Description used to hold text that will occasionally appear at the end of combat.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Look at how clean and tidy it's around here.
Ufufu, look how burned you are.

ShadowSiren:BossFightTextContainer.NAME: Boss Fight Text
ShadowSiren:BossFightTextContainer.DESCRIPTION: Extended Description used to hold text that will occasionally appear at the beginning of a boss fight.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Here it is! A powerful one!
Ahaha! This is going to be fun.

ShadowSiren:HealingTextContainer.NAME: Healing Text
ShadowSiren:HealingTextContainer.DESCRIPTION: Extended Description used to hold text that will occasionally appear when healing.

ShadowSiren:FieldDamageTextContainer.NAME: Field Damage Text
ShadowSiren:FieldDamageTextContainer.DESCRIPTION: Extended Description used to hold text that will occasionally appear when taking thorns damage.

ShadowSiren:LightDamageTextContainer.NAME: Light Damage Text
ShadowSiren:LightDamageTextContainer.DESCRIPTION: Extended Description used to hold text that will occasionally appear when taking light damage.

ShadowSiren:HeavyDamageTextContainer.NAME: Heavy Damage Text
ShadowSiren:HeavyDamageTextContainer.DESCRIPTION: Extended Description used to hold text that will occasionally appear when taking heavy damage.

ShadowSiren:BlockedDamageTextContainer.NAME: Blocked Damage Text
ShadowSiren:BlockedDamageTextContainer.DESCRIPTION: Extended Description used to hold text that will occasionally appear when blocking damage.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: What, did you just do something?

ShadowSiren:HomemarkTextContainer.NAME: Homemark Text
ShadowSiren:HomemarkTextContainer.DESCRIPTION: Extended Description used to hold text that will occasionally appear when spending gold with the Homemark.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Dang, I wanted to burn them.
I don't need this many of these.
These coins are nothing but a burden.
*sigh* What I want is war, not these stupid things.

ShadowSiren:KOTextContainer.NAME: KO Text
ShadowSiren:KOTextContainer.DESCRIPTION: Extended Description used to hold text that will occasionally appear when defeated in battle.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: No way... Why do I even exist?
I-I got defeated by a thing like that...
I had to win... I must always win!
